about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all [Earth Day 2022 Garden] decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
  • Sea Rocks
  • Glitter Whale Statue
  • Orange Coral Reef
  • Edging Conches
  • Sea Turtle Rug
  • Starfish Pathway

**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
